Casa EC

interior / Imola, Italy / 2019

  10. Client: undisclosed Value: 20.000 euros Status: Ongoing

    A series of intervention in an historical building. Simple, white yet formally dynamic objects are placed in contrast to the richly decorated ambience, creating mutual enhancement rather than contrast, thanks to the ethereal, almost conceptual nature of the new furniture. The project is deployed on a large timescale to minimize the impact on the occupants of the house.
